name: 3 Real Inventor Piggies
description:
Version 0.2

This is a game made for Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it Alive

Revisiting the untold stories of the 3 Little Pigs, this story aims to capture the behind the scenery of 3 Real Investor Piggies (RIP) who take over the reigns of their previous mayor of New Pork Town.

Take the role of maintaining and providing support, curating the little piggies that you raise as your own in this town. Hire them for jobs, feed them, build homes. The possibilities are endless.

However, BEWARE the Baddy Wolf. He has a 50% chance of appearing on the ranch at midnight. Build legions of pigs to thwart away the evil plot of their arch-nemesis and keep a safe healthy city.

Game Over if the population of pigs reaches zero.

GAME IN DEVELOPMENT. EXPECT MORE CONTENT SOON.
